details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-4:2020 - 6.2.4 Colour Spaces - 6.2.4.2 ICCBased colour spaces
details.description: The profile that forms the stream of an ICCBased colour space shall conform to ISO 32000-2:2020, 8.6.5.5.

rule.description: The profile that forms the stream of an ICCBased colour space shall conform to ISO 32000-2:2020, 8.6.5.5.
rule.test: (deviceClass == "prtr" || deviceClass == "mntr" || deviceClass == "scnr" || deviceClass == "spac") && (colorSpace == "RGB " || colorSpace == "CMYK" || colorSpace == "GRAY" || colorSpace == "Lab ") && version < 5.0

error.message: The embedded ICC profile (Device Class = %1, color space = %2, version = %3) is either invalid or does not satisfy PDF 2.0 requirements
